sn25.2:1.8: Yo, bhikkhave, ime dhamme evam saddahati adhimuccati, ayam vuccati saddhanusari, okkanto sammattaniyamam, sappurisabhumim okkanto, vitivatto puthujjanabhumim;
sn25.2:1.9: abhabbo tam kammam katum, yam kammam katva nirayam va tiracchanayonim va pettivisayam va upapajjeyya;
sn25.2:1.10: abhabbo ca tava kalam katum yava na sotapattiphalam sacchikaroti.
sn25.2:2.1: Yassa kho, bhikkhave, ime dhamma evam pannaya mattaso nijjhanam khamanti, ayam vuccati: ‘dhammanusari, okkanto sammattaniyamam, sappurisabhumim okkanto, vitivatto puthujjanabhumim;
sn25.2:2.2: abhabbo tam kammam katum, yam kammam katva nirayam va tiracchanayonim va pettivisayam va upapajjeyya;
sn25.2:2.3: abhabbo ca tava kalam katum yava na sotapattiphalam sacchikaroti’.
sn25.2:2.4: Yo, bhikkhave, ime dhamme evam pajanati evam passati, ayam vuccati:
